title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository - get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Chat with local models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Simple API to run and chat with Llama 3, Mistral, etc. locally.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI). ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex. Shows ingestion + Q&A over local docs.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns Ollama into a GitHub Copilot replacement. Inline suggestions and chat window.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that proxies chat to any Ollama model. Supports slash commands and conversation threads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust. Interactive model picker, chat history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate, embed, and manage models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API. Includes chat, generate, embed, and pull endpoints.

title: ollama-chat-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane. Use local models to assist note writing and summarization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset. Use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of Ollama examples: function calling, vision, RAG, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes. Supports GPU nodes, PVC, ingress, autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: ChatGPT Plugin that proxies requests to a local Ollama instance. Lets ChatGPT use Llama 3 as its backend.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies. Written in Go.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module example showing how to containerize and test Ollama models in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Published Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama. Zero-dependency TypeScript client with Node and browser support.
